title: The Athena Prodigies: Empowering Women, Empowering Girls
description: The ATHENA Prodigies: Empowering Women Empowering Girls provides a distinctive method of creating a reflection period for women readers to empower them to re-connect with their dreams is established. The impact is the building of their self-belief and confidence to help themselves go after what they really want all the while helping a young girl identify and grow her own dreams and desires through a mentoring dynamic. The ATHENA Prodigies relays to readers the importance of time spent between women and young girls engaged in deep reflective and honest communication. Sharing ideas, dreams and fears between women and girls can result in the proactive building of self-esteem for both persons as well as the development of an intimate, reflexive relationship where each individual will have tremendous value learning not just about themselves, but about the person they are sharing their time with.
author: Danielle Joworski
